fields.question: What does TBAE stand for?
fields.answer: TBAE stands for Team Building and Events. We specialise in organizing team building activities and events for organizations across South Africa.

fields.question: How long has TBAE been operating?
fields.answer: TBAE has been facilitating team building and events since 2005.

fields.question: Where is TBAE based?
fields.answer: Our head office is in Johannesburg, but we offer team building and events nationwide.

fields.question: How do I book a team building event?
fields.answer: You can book via our website, by emailing info@tbae.co.za, or by calling our office directly.

fields.question: What payment methods do you accept?
fields.answer: We accept EFT, credit card, and company purchase orders.

fields.question: Do you require a deposit to secure a booking?
fields.answer: Yes, a 50% deposit is required to confirm your booking. The balance is due before the event date.

fields.question: Can I get a quotation before booking?
fields.answer: Absolutely! You can request a quote online or contact our team for a tailored proposal.

fields.question: Do you provide venues?
fields.answer: Yes, TBAE offers a wide selection of venues across South Africa to suit all types of team building events.

fields.question: Can we use our own venue?
fields.answer: Yes, we can facilitate events at your premises or a venue of your choice.

fields.question: Is there a cost difference for different venues?
fields.answer: Venue costs vary depending on location, size, and available facilities. Our team will advise you based on your requirements.

fields.question: Do your venues offer catering?
fields.answer: Most of our venues provide catering options. Specific menus and pricing will be included in your proposal.

fields.question: Are there venues in all major cities?
fields.answer: Yes, we have partner venues in Johannesburg, Cape Town, Durban, Pretoria, and many more locations.

fields.question: What types of team building activities do you offer?
fields.answer: We offer indoor, outdoor, virtual, and customized activities for all group sizes and objectives.

fields.question: Can the activities be tailored to our company’s objectives?
fields.answer: Yes, all activities can be tailored to address your team’s specific goals.

fields.question: Do you provide facilitators for the activities?
fields.answer: Every event includes professional facilitators to guide and motivate your group.

fields.question: Can activities be conducted outdoors?
fields.answer: Yes, we offer many exciting outdoor team building options across South Africa.

fields.question: Do you offer virtual team building events?
fields.answer: Yes, our virtual events are designed to engage remote teams and build stronger connections online.

fields.question: What platforms do you use for virtual events?
fields.answer: We use Zoom, Microsoft Teams, and Google Meet, depending on your preference.

fields.question: Do virtual activities require special software?
fields.answer: No special software is needed beyond a standard video conferencing platform.

fields.question: What outdoor activities are most popular?
fields.answer: Our Amazing Race, Survivor, and Sports Day events are especially popular for outdoor team building.

fields.question: Are outdoor activities weather dependent?
fields.answer: Yes, weather may impact certain activities. We always provide alternative indoor options if needed.

fields.question: What should we bring to outdoor events?
fields.answer: Comfortable clothing, sunblock, and a great attitude! Any special requirements will be provided in advance.

fields.question: Do you have packages for large companies?
fields.answer: Yes, we offer scalable packages and pricing for both small and large corporate groups.

fields.question: Are there special rates for non-profits?
fields.answer: We are happy to discuss special rates for NPOs—please contact us for more details.

fields.question: Can you organize events for international teams?
fields.answer: Absolutely, we have experience working with multinational clients both in-person and virtually.

fields.question: What health and safety measures are in place?
fields.answer: We follow all government guidelines and ensure your team’s safety is our top priority.

fields.question: Do you provide first aid on site?
fields.answer: Yes, all our facilitators are trained in first aid and safety protocols.

fields.question: Is there medical assistance available during events?
fields.answer: We have first aid kits on site and emergency protocols for all venues.

fields.question: What time should we arrive for our event?
fields.answer: Arrival times vary by event. Your event coordinator will provide details in advance.

fields.question: Is food provided during events?
fields.answer: Catering can be arranged as part of your package. Please discuss any dietary requirements with your coordinator.

fields.question: Can we bring our own refreshments?
fields.answer: Most venues allow you to bring your own refreshments. Check with your event coordinator to confirm.

fields.question: What is your cancellation policy?
fields.answer: Cancellations made more than 7 days before the event will receive a full refund. Less than 7 days may incur charges.

fields.question: Can I reschedule my booking?
fields.answer: Yes, rescheduling is possible subject to availability. Please contact your coordinator as soon as possible.

fields.question: How are refunds processed?
fields.answer: Refunds are processed to your original payment method and typically take 3-5 business days.

fields.question: Are your events accessible for people with disabilities?
fields.answer: We strive to make all events accessible. Please inform us of any specific needs so we can accommodate your group.

fields.question: Can I bring a guide dog to the event?
fields.answer: Yes, guide dogs are welcome at all our venues.

fields.question: Do you provide sign language interpreters?
fields.answer: Interpreters can be arranged upon request, subject to availability.

fields.question: How do I contact TBAE support?
fields.answer: You can reach us by email at info@tbae.co.za, or by calling our office at +27 11 609 2234.

fields.question: Can I request a custom package?
fields.answer: Absolutely! We are happy to create a bespoke package tailored to your needs.

fields.question: Is there support available after hours?
fields.answer: Our team monitors emails after hours and will respond as quickly as possible to urgent queries.

fields.question: How far in advance should I book?
fields.answer: We recommend booking at least 2-4 weeks in advance to secure your preferred date and venue.

fields.question: Do you offer team building for schools or youth groups?
fields.answer: Yes, we have special packages for schools, universities, and youth organizations.

fields.question: Can you organize multi-day retreats?
fields.answer: Absolutely! We can arrange overnight and multi-day team building experiences.

fields.question: What is included in an outdoor event package?
fields.answer: Our packages typically include facilitation, venue, catering, and all equipment needed for your chosen activities.

fields.question: Do you offer discounts for repeat clients?
fields.answer: We value our loyal clients and offer special discounts for repeat business. Please inquire for details.

fields.question: Is parking available at your venues?
fields.answer: Most of our venues offer secure parking on-site. Please confirm with your coordinator.

fields.question: How quickly will I receive a response to my query?
fields.answer: We strive to respond to all inquiries within one business day.

fields.question: Do you conduct risk assessments for activities?
fields.answer: Yes, we assess all activities and venues to ensure maximum safety.

fields.question: Can you accommodate guests with special dietary needs?
fields.answer: Of course! Please let us know any requirements in advance.

fields.question: Do you offer references or testimonials?
fields.answer: Yes, we can provide references from previous satisfied clients.
